subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Amaro, a second-round draft pick in 2014 who was hurt in the preseason opener, has a torn labrum, costing the Jets a receiving threat at one of their weaker positions.
snippet: Amaro, a second-round draft pick in 2014 who was hurt in the preseason opener, has a torn labrum, costing the Jets a receiving threat at one of their weaker positions.
